name: Greek Pita Chips
description: A lower-fat alternative to potato chips that’s the perfect addition to a Greek Mezze board! Infused with flavours of garlic, oregano, and lemon. Serve alongside Dillicous Tzatziki, hummus, or your favourite dip.
preparation: Split 4 pita rounds in half to make 8 rounds.
Combine olive oil, lemon juice and Souvlaki. Brush on the inside of each pita round. Sprinkle with Sea Salt.
Cut each round into 8 wedges and place in a single layer on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Bake for 10–15 minutes until crisp and golden brown.
tips: Serve with prepared Greek Dressing or Dillicious Tzatziki and prepared Chicken Souvlaki.
